paragraphs.chinese: 谁知道上次所立的那位老太妃已经驾崩了，所有诰命们都在入朝按照爵位守丧。皇上又颁发了圣旨，告知天下，有爵位的家族一年内都不得宴请和奏乐，平民百姓们则三个月内都不能结婚和娶亲。贾母和儿孙们每天都要入朝参加祭祀，直到未正时后才能返回。在大偏宫二十一日后，老太妃的灵柩才被请入先陵，地点在孝慈县。这陵墓距离京城要十来天的路程，如今灵柩到这里，还要停留几天才能入地宫，所以有一月的空档。宁府贾珍夫妻俩也得去守丧。两府没有主事之人，于是大家商量，将尤氏生孩子的事报上，将她腾挪出来，负责协理荣宁两府的事情。

paragraphs.original: 因托了薛姨妈在园内照管他姊妹丫鬟，只得也挪进园来。此时宝钗处有湘云香菱；李纨处目今李婶母虽去，然有时来往，三五日不定，贾母又将宝琴送与他去照管；迎春处有岫烟；探春因家务冗杂，且不时有赵姨娘与贾环嘈聒，甚不方便；惜春处房屋狭小：因此，薛姨妈都难住。况贾母又千叮咛，万嘱咐，托他照管黛玉，－－自己素性也最怜爱他，今既巧遇这事，便挪至潇湘馆和黛玉同房，一应药饵，饮食，十分经心。黛玉感戴不尽，以后便亦如宝钗之称呼，连宝钗前亦直以“姐姐”呼之，宝琴前直以“妹妹”呼之：俨似同胞共出，较诸人更似亲切。贾母见如此，也十分喜悦放心。
paragraphs.english: 薛姨妈, due to her responsibility for looking after Dai Yu and her sister, moved Dai Yu into the Grand View Garden. In the garden, she had company from other family members like Baoshan, Xiangling, and Xiangyun, and sometimes Liwan would visit. In addition, there were Baqi, Yingchun, and Xiushan. However, Tangxin found it inconvenient to frequently meet with her mother, Zhaoye and her brother Jiahuan due to her busy household chores. Her quarters were also too small. After being reassured by her mother, Jialu, that she would take care of Dai Yu, due to her affection for Dai Yu, she moved in with Dai Yu. She was very particular about Dai Yu's daily needs. Dai Yu was deeply grateful and started to address her aunt as "Baoshan" and called Baqi "little sister", making it seem like they were siblings. The old lady was delighted and relieved to see such a close relationship between them.
paragraphs.chinese: 薛姨妈因为要照顾黛玉姐妹，将黛玉也接到大观园中去住，大观园中薛姨妈身边有宝钗、香菱、湘云，有时李纨会到，还有宝琴、迎春、岫烟，探春却因家务繁忙，还要时常见到赵姨娘和贾环，不方便，惜春的住处狭小。薛姨妈在贾母的千叮万嘱下，答应去照顾黛玉，因为平日里就特别疼爱黛玉，这次又巧遇这样的机会，便和黛玉住在了一起，薛姨妈对黛玉的饮食起居十分用心。黛玉对薛姨妈感激不尽，开始也像称呼宝钗一样称呼薛姨妈，对宝琴也直呼妹妹，仿佛她们是同胞姐妹，比别人关系更亲密。贾母看到这样的情景，也十分高兴和放心。

paragraphs.original: 薛姨妈只不过照管他姊妹，禁约的丫鬟辈，一应家中大小事务也不肯多口。尤氏虽天天过来，也不过应名点卯，不肯乱作威福。且他家内上下，也只剩了他一人料理；再者，每日还要照管贾母王夫人的下处一应所需饮馔铺设之物：所以也甚操劳。
paragraphs.english: Xue Yimei only took care of her sisters and maids. She didn't get involved with the large or small matters of the family. Although You Si came over every day, she was just making a show of visiting, and she wouldn't give orders willy-nilly. Only she could manage the household now that the rest of the family had dispersed. Besides, she had to take care of where Old Lady Jia and Madam Wang lived, as well as make sure all their daily needs for food and drink were taken care of. That was a lot of work, and she really did have her hands full.
paragraphs.chinese: 薛姨妈只是照看着他姊妹和丫鬟们的事情，家里大小的事情，她不多嘴多舌。尤氏虽然每天过来，也只是应个名而已，不肯乱发号施令。他家里上下，只剩他一个人料理；再者，他还要照看着贾母和王夫人的住处，每天所需用的饮和吃的东西，他都得操心。所以，他真的很操劳。

paragraphs.original: 当下荣宁两处主人既如此不暇，并两处执事人等，或有跟随著入朝的，或有朝外照理下处事务的，又有先踩踏下处的，也都各各忙乱。因此两处下人无了正经头绪，也都偷安，或乘隙结党和权暂执事者窃弄威福。荣府只留得赖大并几个管家照管外务。这赖大手下常用几个人已去，虽另委人，都是些生的，只觉不顺手。且他们无知，或赚骗无节，或呈告无据，或举荐无因，种种不善，在在生事，也难备述。又见各官宦家，凡养优伶男女者，一概蠲免遣发。尤氏等便议定，待王夫人回家回明，也欲遣发十二个女孩子。又说：“这些人原是买的，如今虽不学唱，尽可留著使唤，只令其教习们自去也罢了。”王夫人因说：“这学戏的，倒比不得使唤的：他们也是好人家的女儿，因无能卖了做这事，装神弄鬼的几年。如今有这机会，不如给他们几两银子盘费，各自去罢。当日祖宗手里都是有这例的。偺们如今损阴坏德，而且还小气。如今虽有几个老的还在，那是他们各有原故，不肯回去的，所以才留下使唤，大了配了我们家里小厮们了。”尤氏道：“如今我们也去问他十二个。有愿意回去的，就带了信儿，叫他父母来亲自领回去，给他们几两银子盘缠，方妥；倘若不叫上他的亲人来，只怕有混账人冒名领出去，又转卖了，岂不辜负了这恩典？若有不愿意回去的就留下。”王夫人笑道：“这话妥当。”

荣宁两府的主人各忙于自己的事务，无暇顾及家下事务。荣府留了赖大和几个管家照看家下事务。赖大的手下人有的出走，有的在原处，但新委任的人又不能使赖大满意。这都是些不知事理的人，他们或是巧取豪夺，或是胡乱告状，或是举荐人不称职，弄得家下无处安放。又见官宦人家养的伶人女子，朝廷免去征税，并遣散。尤氏等人认为家下十二个伶人女子也该遣散，但王夫人认为这些人原是被卖作伶人，虽不唱戏，也应留用，或是他们自己离开也行。王夫人说这些人原是好人家的女儿，被卖作了伶人，几年来无所事事，应给每人几两银子，让他们自己离开。尤氏说也得问他们，愿意回自己家的，给他们银子让他们回家，不让他们亲人领回去，怕有假领走，再卖了。王夫人说最好还是让亲人才可靠，不愿意回的就留下。尤氏说这话妥当。#宫# 荣宁两府的主人为了自己的事，顾不上管家里的人。荣府就留了赖大和几个管家来管理家里的事情。可是赖大那些手下的人，有的走掉了，有的还在，但新委任的人又不顺手。他们什么都不懂，就干些讹诈、胡乱告状、推荐不称职的人的事。王夫人觉得这些伶人女子原是好人家的女儿，被卖作伶人，几年来无所事事，又没用，倒不如给他们点钱让他们自己离开。尤氏说现在也有愿意回自己家的人，可以让他们回家，并给点盘缠；不愿意回去的留下。王夫人说还是给点钱让他们自己走吧，比较可靠。#宫# 

（113）荣宁二处主人既不暇顾家下之人，又无随侍往朝之人，或有在府照管下处事务者，或有跟著进朝者，或有或无，各各忙乱。因此二处家下之人，既无正经头绪，更兼偷安，或乘间结党，或权暂执事之人，窃弄威福。独荣府中只赖大并几个总管管外务。赖大手下常有之人去后，虽又委人，俱系生疏，未免各各不顺手。况且无知，或赚骗无节，或呈告无据，或举荐无因，种种不善，无处不生事端。又见各官宦家，凡养优伶男女者，一概蠲免遣发。尤氏等议定，待王夫人回家回明，也欲遣发十二个女孩子。又说：“这些人原是买的，如今虽不唱，尽可留著使唤，只令教习自去便了。”王夫人道：“这等学戏的，比不得使唤的，他们也是好人家的女儿，因无能卖了做这事。几年来装神弄鬼的，如今有这机会，不如给他们几两银子，各自去了罢。当日祖宗手里都是有这例的。我们如今损阴害德，还小气。如今虽有几个老的，各有原故，不肯回去的，所以才留下使唤，大的已经配了我们家里小厮们了。”尤氏道：“如今我们也去问他十二个，有愿意回去的，带了信儿，叫他父母来亲自领回去，给他们几两银子盘缠方妥。倘然不叫上他的亲人来，只怕有混账人冒名领出去，又转卖了，岂不辜负了这恩典？若有不愿意回去的就留下。”王夫人笑道：“这话妥当。”#宫#

paragraphs.original: 尤氏等遣人告诉了凤姐儿，一面说与总理房中：每教习给银八两，令其自便。凡梨香院一应物件，查清记册收明，派人上夜。将十二个女孩子叫来当面细问，倒有一多半不愿意回家的。也有说父母虽有，他只以卖我们姊妹为事，这一去还被他卖了；也有说父母已亡，或被伯叔兄弟所卖的；也有说无人可投的；也有说恋恩不舍的。所愿去者只四五人。
paragraphs.english: Yao and others sent word to the Third Lady telling her all this, and also instructed the man in charge of managing the household to hand out eighty taels of silver to each of the servants. He was also told to allow them to do as they pleased. He was to check and keep a record of all the furniture and utensils in the pear garden and appoint someone to guard them. He was then sent to summon the twelve girls to be questioned one by one. Only a large portion of them did not want to return home. Some said that their parents were still alive but sold them to earn money; some said that their parents had already died or were sold by their brothers and sisters; some said that they had no one to turn to; and some said that they could not bear to part from her. Finally, only four or five of them were willing to leave.
paragraphs.chinese: 尤氏等人派人告诉了凤姐，同时告知总管房中，每人发给八十两银子，任其自便。凡是梨香院的家具器物，查清清单，登记清楚，并派专人看守。将十二个女孩子叫来当面一一询问，发现有一大半不想回家。有的说父母虽然活着，但只把我们姐妹卖了钱；有的说父母已经去世，或者被伯叔兄弟卖了；有的说没有可以投奔的人；有的说舍不得离开。最终愿意离开的只有四五个人。

paragraphs.original: 王夫人听了，只得留下，将去者四五人皆令其乾娘领回家去，单等他亲父母来领；将不愿去者分散在园中使唤。贾母便留下文官自使，将正旦芳官指给了宝玉，小旦蕊官送了宝钗，小生藕官指给了黛玉，大花面葵官送了湘云，小花面豆官送了宝琴，老外艾官指给了探春，尤氏便讨了老旦茄官去。当下各得其所，就如那倦鸟出笼，每日园中游戏。众人皆知他们不能针黹，不惯使用，皆不大责备。其中或有一二个知事的，愁将来无应时之技，亦将本技丢开，便学起针黹纺绩女工诸务。
paragraphs.english: Lady Wang, having heard this, was left with no choice but to stay. She had the four or five people who were about to leave take their godmothers back. She waited for their parents to come and take them away. Those who did not want to go were assigned to do chores in the garden. Grandma Wang kept Wen Guan for her own use and gave Fang Guan to Bao Yi, Rui Guan to Bao Chao, You Guan to Laide, Gui Guan to Xiangyun, Dou Guan to Baoqin, and Qiao Guan to Tang Ping. The Yu family claimed the old旦, Qiao Guan. At the moment, everyone had found their place, like birds in a cage that had flown out. They played daily in the garden. Everyone knew they were not skilled in needlework or used to handling various objects, so they were not too harsh on them. A few who knew of the situation feared they would lose their skills if they did not learn new ones and thus started learning needlework, spinning, weaving, embroidery, and other female tasks.
paragraphs.chinese: 王夫人听了，只好留下，将要走的四、五个人都让他们的干妈领回去了，只等他们的父母来领。将不愿意去的人分发在园子里做事。贾母将文官留下自用，将正旦芳官给了宝玉，小旦蕊官给了宝钗，小生藕官给了黛玉，大花面葵官给了湘云，小花面豆官给了宝琴，老外艾官给了探春，尤氏便讨了老旦茄官。当下各人各得其所，就像笼中鸟儿飞出了笼子，每日在园中游戏。众人知道他们不会做针线活，不习惯使用各种东西，都不怎么责怪他们。其中一两个人知道事情的，怕将来没有应时的技艺，也把原来的技艺丢开，学起了做针线活、纺线、织布、女红等事务。

paragraphs.original: 一日，正是朝中大祭，贾母等五更便去了。先到下处用些点心小食，然后入朝。早膳已毕，方退至下处歇息。用过早饭，略歇片刻，复入朝侍中晚二祭，方出至下处歇息。用过晚饭方回家。可巧这下处乃是一个大官的家庙，是比邱尼焚修，房舍极多极净，东西二院。荣府便赁了东院，北静王府便赁了西院。太妃少妃，每日晏息，见贾母等在东院，彼此同出同入，都有照应。
paragraphs.english:
翻译:

One day, it happened to be the time of imperial sacrifice. The Empress Dowager and her entourage arrived at the place of rest before dawn. They ate their morning meal there and then entered the palace. After the morning meal, they returned to the place of rest to rest. After having breakfast, they had a short rest and returned to the palace to serve the king and participate in the second sacrifice of the evening. Then, they returned to the place of rest. They returned home only after dinner. It happened that this place of rest was a temple of a high official for nuns to practice, with many clean rooms, divided into two courtyards, east and west. The Rong Family rented the eastern courtyard, and the Beijing Prince of the North rented the western courtyard. The Empresses Dowager, concubines, and others could look after each other when they saw the Empress Dowager and her entourage in the eastern courtyard.
paragraphs.chinese: 一天，正赶上朝廷举行大祭，贾母等人从天亮前就去了。他们先在下榻处吃些早点，然后进入朝廷。早膳吃过，才退回到下榻处休息。吃过早饭，稍作休息，又回到朝廷侍奉君王，参加晚上的第二次祭祀，然后回到下榻处休息。吃过晚饭才回家。正好，这家下榻处是一个大官的家庙，供比丘尼们修道，房舍多而干净，分为东西两个院落。荣府租用了东院，北静王府租用了西院。太妃、少妃们每日的起居，见到贾母等人在东院，互相之间都能照应。

paragraphs.original: 外面诸事不消细述。且说大观园内，因贾母王夫人天天不在家内，又送灵去一月方回，各丫鬟婆子皆有闲空，多在园内游玩。更又将梨香院内伏侍的众婆子一概撤回，并散在园内听使，更觉园内人多了几十个。因文官等一干人，或心性高傲，或倚势凌下，或拣衣挑食，或口角锋芒，大概不安分守己者多：因此，众婆子含怨，只是口中不敢与他们分争。如今散了学，大家趁了愿，也有丢开手的，也有心地狭窄犹怀旧怨的，因将众人皆分在各房名下，不敢来厮侵。
paragraphs.english: In the garden, there were other things that didn't need to be detailed. In the Grand View Garden, since Grandmother Jia and Madam Wang were not in the garden every day, and because they had sent off the coffin for a month, the maids and old women in the garden had nothing to do, so they went around and played in the garden. They also recalled the maids from the梨香院, and scattered them around the garden for use. This resulted in an increase of several dozen people in the garden. As for people like Wen Guan, there were those who were proud and conceited, those who relied on their power to bully others, those who were picky, and those who lacked self-control. In short, there were many people who did not respect their duties. Therefore, although the maids were unhappy in their hearts, they did not dare to argue with them. Now that school was out, everyone had achieved their desires, and some people just let go, while others were petty and still harbored resentment for past matters. Therefore, they were distributed among the various rooms under their names, daring not to disrupt everyone's peaceful life.
paragraphs.chinese: 园子里的其他事情就不一一细说了。就说大观园里，因为贾母王夫人天天不在园子里，又一连一个月送灵去外头，所以园子里的那些丫鬟婆子都闲着没事，都到园子里转转玩玩去了。又把梨香院里的那些婆子撤了回来，散在园子里听使唤，这样一来，园子里的人数就多了几十个。因为像文官他们这样的一干人，有的心高气傲，有的仗势欺人，有的挑三拣四，有的口无遮拦，总之，不守本分的人多。所以那些婆子们心里虽然有怨气，可是不敢和他们争辩。现在放学了，大家都实现了自己的心愿，有的人就放手不管了，有的人心里小气，还对以前的事怀恨在心。所以就把大家分到各个房里名下，不敢来破坏大家的平静生活。

paragraphs.original: 可巧这日乃是清明之日，贾琏已备下年例祭祀，带领贾环、贾琮、贾兰三人去往铁槛寺祭柩烧纸；宁府贾蓉也同族中人前往各处祭祀。因宝玉病未大愈，故不曾去得。饭后发倦，袭人因说：“天气甚好，你且出去逛逛，省的撂下粥碗就睡，存在心里。”
paragraphs.english:
翻译:

Just this day was Qingming Festival, and Jialiang had already prepared the usual sacrificial items. He took Jiahuan, Jiacong, and Jialan to the Iron Rail Temple to worship their ancestors, burned incense, and burned paper. Jia Rong of the Ning Mansion also led his clan members to various places for sacrifices. Since Bao Yu's illness hadn't yet recovered, he couldn't go. After lunch, Bao Yu felt drowsy, and Xishi said, "It's such a nice day, go for a walk. Don't just lie down and sleep after eating; it's not good for your health."

Nowadays, people enjoy eating, drinking, and having fun, and some have started not taking eating well and drinking well seriously. However, the body is still one's own, so it's important to pay attention to taking care of it. Just like Bao Yu, after lunch he felt drowsy, and Xishi reminded him to go for a walk instead of immediately going to sleep. This is good for your health. So, even when you're enjoying your leisure time, don't neglect taking care of your body. Enjoy the moment, but remember to take care of yourself too.
paragraphs.chinese:
恰好这天是清明节，贾琏已经备好了例行祭祀的东西，带着贾环、贾琮、贾兰三人去铁槛寺祭拜祖先，焚香烧纸。宁府的贾蓉也带着族人前往各处祭祀。因为宝玉的病还没痊愈，所以没去成。饭后宝玉觉得困倦，袭人说：“天气这么好，你出去走走，别吃完饭就睡，对身体不好。”

现在人们吃喝玩乐，有的开始不把吃好喝好当回事了，但是身体毕竟是自己的，还是要多注意保养的。就像宝玉一样，饭后困倦，袭人提醒他出去走走，而不是立即睡觉，这样对身体有好处。所以，即使在闲暇时光里享受生活，也不能忽视对身体的照顾哦。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听说，只得拄了一支杖，靸著鞋，走出院来。因近日将园中分与众婆子料理，各司各业，皆在忙时：也有修竹的，也有树的，也有栽花的，也有种豆的，池中间又有驾娘们行著船夹泥的，种藕的。湘云、香菱、宝琴与些丫鬟等都坐在山石上，瞧他们取乐。宝玉也慢慢行来。湘云见了他来，忙笑说：“快把这船打出去！他们是接林妹妹的。”众人都笑起来。宝玉红了脸，也笑道：“人家的病，谁是好意的？你也形容著取笑儿！”湘云笑道：“病也比人家另一样，原招笑儿，反说起人来。”说著，宝玉便也坐下，看著众人忙乱了一回，湘云因说：“这里有风，石头上又冷，坐坐去罢。”
paragraphs.english: 宝玉 listened, and with the aid of his stick, he stumbled out in his slippers. Lately, he had been assigning the ladies of the household to tend to the gardens, so everyone was quite busy: some pruning bamboo, others planting trees, others flowers, others beans. In the pond, some girls were paddling boats, ferrying earth and planting lotus. Xiangyun, Langxiang, Ping'anqin, and some maids were sitting on a boulder, watching the commotion. Seeing him come near, Xiangyun called out in a cheerful voice, "Quick, get the boat away! They're going to fetch Lin!" Everyone burst into laughter. His face flushed, he laughed and said, "Who has a good motive for anyone else's illness? Are you mocking me?" Xiangyun laughed, "Being sick makes one more interesting than usual. It was meant to be mocked, but you're being the one to berate others." As he sat down, they watched the commotion for a moment. Xiangyun said, "The wind here is strong, and the rocks are cold. Why not sit for a while?"
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉听了，只得扶著拐杖，趿拉着鞋走了出来。因为近日把园里分派给老妈妈们打理，所以大家都很忙：有人修竹，有人植树，有人种花，有人种豆。池塘里，还有些姑娘们乘著船，一边划一边运泥土，一边种藕。湘云、香菱、宝琴和一些丫鬟坐在山石上，看着他们取乐。宝玉也慢慢地走了过来。湘云见他来了，忙笑着说：“快把那船划走！他们是在接林妹妹。”大家都笑了起来。宝玉脸红了，笑着说：“别人的病，谁是有好意的？你也拿这个取笑啊！”湘云笑着说：“病的时候也比别人有意思，本来是可以拿来取笑的，你反而责怪起别人来。”说著，宝玉也坐下来，看着大家忙乱了一阵。湘云说：“这里风大，石头又凉，坐一会儿吧。”

paragraphs.original: 宝玉也正要去瞧黛玉，起身拄拐，辞了他们，从沁芳桥一带堤上走来。只见柳垂金线，桃吐丹霞。山石之后，一株大杏树，花已全落，叶稠阴翠，上面已结了豆子大小的许多小杏。宝玉因想道：“能病了几天，竟把杏花辜负了！不觉到‘绿叶成阴子满枝’了！”因此，仰望杏子不舍。又想起邢岫烟已择了夫婿一事，虽说男女大事，不可不行，但未免又少了一个好女儿，不过二年，便也要“绿叶成阴子满枝”了。再过几日，这杏树子落枝空；再几年，岫烟也不免乌发如银，红颜似缟：因此，不免伤心，只管对杏叹息。正想叹时，忽有一个雀儿飞来，落于枝上乱啼。宝玉又发了呆性，心下想道：“这雀儿必定是杏花正开时他曾来过，今见无花空有叶，故也乱啼。这声韵必是啼哭之声。可恨公冶长不在眼前，不能问他。但不知明年再发时，这个雀儿可还记得飞到这里来与杏花一会不能？……”正自胡思间，忽见一股火花从山石那边发出，将雀儿惊飞。宝玉吃了一惊。又听外边有人喊道：“藕官，你要死！怎么弄些纸钱进来烧？我回奶奶们去，仔细你的肉！”
paragraphs.english: He was just about to go to see Dahuilian, got up and took his staff, bid his goodbyes, and walked around the clear-scented bridge. The willow branches were drooping like strands of gold, and the peach blossoms were like a bright red cloud. Behind the rocks, there was a big apricot tree, its blossoms all fallen, its leaves green and lush, with apricots the size of beans already beginning to grow on the tree. Bao-yu thought: "I've been ill for a few days, and I've neglected all the apricot blossoms. I didn't expect that the leaves would already be growing and the apricots would be beginning to bear fruit." He looked up at the apricots, feeling sad, and then thought about Xiong-xiaoyan, who had been married off. Even though marriage is an important event, she is one less daughter. It won't be two years before she will have "grown leaves and borne fruit." Soon after, the apricot tree will have all its fruits on the tree, and in a few more years, Xiong-xiaoyan's black hair will be gray and her red face will be as white as a piece of silk. At this, he was saddened and kept sighing at the apricot tree. Suddenly, he saw a bird fly over and land on the branch, screeching. Bao-yu was startled and thought: "This bird must have been here when the apricot blossoms were in full bloom. Now that it sees that the blossoms are gone, it is screeching in confusion. Its voice must sound like crying. I wish Gong-yang Chang were here, so I could ask him about it. But I wonder if the bird will come here next year to meet with the blossoms again." He was thinking about this when he heard a flare of sparks burst out from the rocks nearby, and the bird flew away. Bao-yu was startled. He then heard someone yell outside, "Aoxuan, you're going to die! How dare you bring in paper money to burn? I'll report you to the ladies, and you'll feel the pain of my words!"
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉正要去看黛玉，起身拄着拐杖和他们辞别，从沁芳桥的一边走过。只见柳枝垂下来像金线一样，桃树的花像一团红霞一样灿烂。山石后面，有一棵大杏树，花都已落光，叶子又绿又密，上面已经结满了豆子大小的杏子。宝玉想：“我生病几天，把杏花都辜负了，没想到现在绿叶已成阴，杏子也满枝头了。”因此，他仰望杏子，心生伤感。又想起邢岫烟已经选了丈夫的事情，虽然男女大事不可不办，但毕竟少了一个好女儿，不出两年，也会变成“绿叶成阴子满枝”了。再过几天，这杏树就会子落枝空；再过几年，岫烟的乌发也会变成银白，红颜也会变得像白布一样。因此，他不免伤心，只管对着杏树叹气。正想着，忽然有一只鸟飞来，落在枝头乱叫。宝玉心里一愣，想：“这只鸟在杏花盛开的时候一定来过这里，现在看到只有叶子，所以也乱叫。它叫声可能像是在哭泣。可惜公冶长不在这里，不能问问他。但不知道明年再开花时，这只鸟还会不会来和杏花相会？”正胡思乱想间，忽然看见一股火花从山石那边发出，把鸟儿惊飞。宝玉吓了一跳。又听见外面有人喊道：“藕官，你要死！怎么把纸钱带进来烧？我回奶奶们去，小心你的肉！”

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听了，益发疑惑起来，忙转过山石看时，只见藕官满面泪痕，蹲在那里，手内还拿著火，守著些纸钱灰作悲。宝玉忙问道：“你给谁烧纸？快别在这里烧。你或是为父母兄弟，你告诉我名姓，外头去叫小厮们打了包袱，写上名姓去烧。”
paragraphs.english:
Translated:

Upon hearing this, Yu Baoyu's doubts increased. He hurriedly turned around the rock to see Qiuguan with tears all over her face, squatting there, still holding the flame, burning paper ash with a mournful voice. Yu Baoyu hurriedly asked, "Who are you burning paper for? Don't burn it here. If it's for your parents or brothers, tell me their names. I'll go out and ask the servants to prepare some bundles, write their names on them, and burn them."

Yu Baoyu, having heard this, grew even more perplexed. In a rush, he turned around the rock and saw Qiuguan, her face streaked with tears, squatting there, still holding the flame, burning the ashes of some paper with a grieving voice. Yu Baoyu hurriedly inquired, "Whom are you burning the paper for? Please don't do it here. If it's for your parents or brothers, tell me their names. I'll go outside and ask the servants to prepare some bundles, write their names on them, and burn them."
paragraphs.chinese:
宝玉听了，更加疑惑起来，忙绕过山石去看，只见藕官满面泪水，蹲在那里，手里还拿着火，烧着些纸灰发着悲声。宝玉急忙问道：“你烧纸给谁？快别在这里烧。你若是为父母或兄弟，你告诉我姓名，到外面去叫小厮们打包，写上姓名去烧。”

宝玉听了，愈发疑惑，急转过山石一看，只见藕官满面泪痕，正蹲在那里，手里拿着火在烧纸灰，还发着悲声。宝玉忙问：“你是在给谁烧纸？别在这里烧。你若是祭奠父母或兄弟，告诉我名字，我出去叫小厮们打包，写上名字去烧。”

paragraphs.original: 藕官见了宝玉，只不做一声。宝玉数问不答。忽见一个婆子恶狠狠的走来拉藕官，口内说道：“我已经回了奶奶们，奶奶们气的了不得！”藕官听了，终是孩气，怕去受辱没脸，便不肯去。婆子道：“我说你们别太兴头过馀了。如今还比得你们在外头乱闹呢！这是尺寸地方儿。”指著宝玉道：“连我们的爷还守规矩呢，你是什么阿物儿，跑了这里来胡闹？－－怕也不中用，跟我快走罢！”宝玉忙道：“他并没烧纸，原是林姑娘叫他烧那烂字纸。你没看真，反错告了他。”
paragraphs.english: Ao Guan met with Yu Bi, but did not speak to him. When Yu Bi asked several times, she would not answer. Then an old woman came over and rudely grabbed Ao Guan. She said, "I've already told the madam about this, and they're quite angry!" Ao Guan was a child, and she was afraid to go and be humiliated. So she did not want to go. The old woman said, "I'm just saying not to go too far. This place is not a good place for you to do whatever you want! There are rules here." She pointed at Yu Bi and said, "Even our master follows the rules, what are you, to do whatever you want here? Don't think you can get away with it, and follow me quickly!" Yu Bi quickly said, "He didn't burn the paper, he was just burning old paper for Lin. You didn't see clearly, and you lied to them."
paragraphs.chinese: 藕官见了宝玉，只是不说话。宝玉问了几遍，她也不回答。突然，来了一位老婆子恶狠狠地拉藕官，嘴里说着：“我已经把这事告诉奶奶们了，她们生气得很！”藕官听了，还是孩子脾气，怕去受辱没脸，于是不肯去。老婆子说：“我说你们不要太过分了。现在这里可不是你们在外头乱闹的地方！这是有规矩的地方。”指着宝玉道：“就连我们的爷还守规矩呢，你是什么东西，在这里胡闹？别想有什么用，跟我快走罢！”宝玉忙道：“他并没有烧纸，只是林姑娘叫他烧那烂字纸。你没看清楚，反而错告了他。”

paragraphs.original: 藕官正没了主意，见了宝玉，更自添了畏惧；忽听他反替遮掩，心内转忧成喜，也便硬著口，说道：“你看真是纸钱子么？我烧的是林姑娘写坏的字纸！”那婆子便弯腰向纸灰中拣出不曾化尽的遗纸在手内，说道：“你还嘴硬！有证又有凭，只和你厅上讲去。”说著，拉了袖子，拽著要走。宝玉忙拉藕官，又用拄杖隔开那婆子的手，说道：“你只管拿了回去。实告诉你：我昨夜做了个梦，梦见杏花神和我要一挂白钱，不可叫本房人烧，另叫生人替烧，我的病就好的快了。所以我请了白钱，巴巴的烦他来替我烧了，我今日才能起来。偏你又看见了！这会子又不好了，都是你冲了，还要告他去？－－藕官，你只管见他们去，就依著这话说！”

paragraphs.chinese: 乾娘越发羞愧，说芳官：“你没良心！你只说我克扣了你的钱！”她便向芳官身上拍了几下。芳官越发哭了起来。宝玉便走出来。袭人忙劝：“做什么！我去说他。”晴雯忙先过去，指着乾娘说道：“你这么大年纪，太不懂事！你不给他好好地洗，我们才给他东西。你自己不觉得羞耻，还敢打他！他要是随班学艺，你也敢打他不成？”婆子说：“‘一日叫娘，终身是母。’他排揎我，我就敢打他。”袭人唤麝月道：“我不会和人拌嘴，晴雯性子太急，你快过去震吓他两句。”

paragraphs.original: 麝月听了，忙过来说道：“你且别嚷，我问问你：别说我们这一处，你看满园子里，谁在主子屋里教导过女儿的？就是你的亲女儿，既经分了房，有了主子，自有主子打骂。再者，大些的姑娘姐姐们也可以打得骂得，谁许你老子娘又半中间管起闲事来了？都这样管，又要叫他们跟著我们学什么？越老越没了规矩！你见前日坠儿的妈来吵，你如今也跟著他学？你们放心！因连日这个病，那个病，再老太太又不得闲，所以我也没有去回。等两日偺们去痛回一回，大家把这威风煞一煞儿才好呢！况且宝玉才好了些，连我们也不敢说话，你反打的人狼号鬼哭的！上头出了几日门，你们就无法无天的，眼珠子里就没了人了！再两天，你们就该打我们了！他也不要你这乾娘！怕粪草埋了他不成？”
paragraphs.english: 晴雯听后急忙制止，说：“你别吵！我问你：你是怎么知道的？难道你以为我们这里，还是整个园子里，有谁可以在主子的房里抚养女儿吗？就算你有亲生女儿，既然分配了房间，有了主子，自然会有主子来管教，他们可以责打责骂。再者，大一些的姑娘和姐姐们也可以管教，但没听说家长会插手管教自己的女儿。如果大家都这样做，规矩就会被破坏。你看到坠儿的妈来找闹，你就跟着学他？放心吧！因为连日来有人生病，老太太没空，所以没去汇报。等过两天，我们会去好好汇报，让规矩回到正轨。况且宝玉才恢复健康，我们都不敢多说话，你却在打人，让他们都哭天喊地！上级出门时，你们就无法无天，眼睛里没了人！再过两天，你们就要开始打我们了！他可不会要你这个干妈！怕粪草埋了他吗？”
paragraphs.chinese:
听了这些话，晴雯越发急了，滚在床底下哭，说：“我方才不言语，你还说的好话，这会子又没的强！我告诉了二奶奶去，看他饶不饶你！”

麝月道：“你们别这样，上头正眼也不看，气的太太们也病了。别看你们年轻，二奶奶手里杀人也不少，你若去一说，他就不剪了你的头了！”

晴雯道：“谁怕了他似的！剪了头，倒是一个明白的人了！”说着，越发气的大哭起来。

麝月又劝了一会，晴雯还是哭个不了。

晴雯听了这话，连忙制止，说：“你别吵，我问你：你到底怎么知道的？别说我们这里，你看整个园子里，有谁在主子房里教养女儿的？就算是你的亲生女儿，既然分配了房，有了主子，自然会有主子管教，他们可以责打责骂。再者，大些的姑娘和姐姐们也可以管教，但没听说家长会插手管教自己的女儿。如果大家这样做，就会使规矩被破坏。你看到坠儿的妈来找闹，就跟着学他？放心吧！因为连日里有人生病，老太太没空，所以没去汇报。等两日之后，我们会去好好汇报一下，让规矩回到正轨。况且宝玉身体才恢复，我们都不敢多说话，你却在打人，让他们都哭天喊地的！上级出门时，你们就无法无天，眼睛里没了人！再过两天，你们就要开始打我们了！他可不会要你这个干妈！怕粪草埋了他吗？”

听了这话，晴雯更加急了，滚到床底下哭了起来，说：“我刚才不说话，你还说得客气，现在却变了一副嘴脸。我去找二奶奶说去，看他怎么处理你！”

麝月说：“你们别这样，上头的人根本不会看你们，气得太太们都生病了。别说你们还年轻，二奶奶手里可是杀了人不少，你要是去说，他不会放过你！”

晴雯说：“谁怕他呀！剪了头发，我就是个明理的人了！”说着，越发气得大哭起来。

麝月又劝了一阵，晴雯还是哭个不停。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉恨的拿拄杖打著门槛子，说道：“这些老婆子都是铁心石肠似的，真是大奇事！不能照看，反倒挫磨他们。地久天长，如何是好！”晴雯道：“什么‘如何是好’？都撵出去，不要这些中看不中吃的就完了！”
paragraphs.english: Bao-yu was so angry that he took the staff to beat the threshold, and said, "What a cold-hearted lot these old ladies are! They have no consideration for others at all. How strange! I have nothing against them, but they are being tormented by us. What good can come of that?" Jing-wen replied, "What's so good about that? Why not just get rid of these people who are good for nothing?"
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉恨得拿拐杖打门槛，说道：“这些老太婆都是铁心肠的，真是一点人情也没有，真怪事！不管他们也罢了，反倒折磨他们，长此下去怎么好！”晴雯道：“有什么‘怎么好’的？赶走这些只好看不好使的人不就完了！”

paragraphs.original: 那婆子羞愧难当，一言不发。只见芳官穿著海棠红的小绵袄，底下绿绸洒花夹裤，敞著裤腿，一头乌油油的头发披在脑后，哭的泪人一般。麝月笑道：“把个莺莺小姐弄成才拷打的红娘了。这会子又不妆扮了，还是这么著？”晴雯因走过去拉了他，替他洗净了发，用手巾拧的乾松松的，挽了一个慵妆髻，命他穿了衣裳，过这边来。
paragraphs.english: The old woman was so ashamed that she could not even speak. Fangguan was dressed in a little velvet jacket that was the color of a chrysanthemum blossom, and she wore green satin trousers with embroidered floral designs, the legs of which were open. Her long, black, oily hair was hanging loose at the back of her head, and she was crying like a weeping woman. Mosuiu laughed and said, "Miss Yingying, you have become the love go-between? And now you don't even put your hair up, you're still in this same state?" Qingwen walked over and pulled Fangguan gently, washed her hair for her, wrung out the towel, tied up her hair in a lazy knot, ordered her to put on her clothes, and made her come over here.
paragraphs.chinese: 这婆子羞愧得无地自容，一句话也没说。只见芳官穿着海棠红的毛哔叽小袄，下边穿着绿绸洒花夹裤，裤腿敞开着，一头黑油油的头发披在脑后，哭得像个泪人儿。麝月笑道：“莺莺小姐怎么被拷问成了红娘？这会子又不梳妆，还是这副模样？”晴雯走过去拉了芳官一把，替她洗了头发，用毛巾拧了拧，挽了个慵懒的发髻，命她穿上衣服，到这边来。

paragraphs.original: 接著内厨房的婆子来问：“晚饭有了，可送不送？”小丫头听了，进来问袭人。袭人笑道：“方才胡吵了一阵，也没留心听听几下钟了。”晴雯道：“这劳什子又不知怎么了，又得去收拾！”说著，拿过表来瞧了一瞧，说道：“再略等半锺茶的工夫就是了。”小丫头去了。麝月笑道：“提起淘气来，芳官也该打两下儿，昨日是他摆弄了那坠子，半日就坏了。”说话之间，便将食具打点现成。
paragraphs.english: Next, a servant in the kitchen came to ask: "Supper is ready, should it be sent over?" Jingwen heard this and asked a maid. Jingwen said, "I was arguing earlier and didn't notice the time." She continued, "That thing seems to be broken again, it needs to be repaired once more." After saying this, she picked up the watch and said, "It can be sent over in half an hour." The maid left. Moxue said, "Speaking of mischief, Fanguan should also be disciplined. It was her playing with that pendant that broke it yesterday." While talking, they had prepared the food.
paragraphs.chinese: 接着，厨房里的婆子来问：“晚饭预备好了，要送去吗？”小丫头听到后进来问晴雯。晴雯笑道：“刚才吵了一阵，我没留心听时间。”晴雯说：“那玩意儿又不知道怎么了，又要修整一番。”说罢，拿起表一看，说道：“再等半个时辰就可以送过去了。”小丫头出去了。麝月说：“说到淘气，芳官也该打两下子，昨日是她摆弄那坠子，半天就坏掉了。”说话间，便收拾好了食物。

paragraphs.original: 一时，小丫头子捧了盒子进来站住。晴雯麝月揭开看时，还是这四样小菜。晴雯笑道：“已经好了，还不给两样清淡菜吃！这稀饭咸菜闹到多早晚！”一面摆好，一面又看那盒中，却有一碗火腿鲜笋汤，忙端了放在宝玉跟前。宝玉便就桌上喝了一口，说道：“好汤！”众人都笑道：“菩萨！能几日没见荤腥儿？就馋的这个样儿！”一面说，一面端起来，轻轻用口吹著。因见芳官在侧，便递给芳官，说道：“你也学些伏侍，别一味傻玩傻睡。嘴儿轻著些，别吹上唾沫星儿。”芳官依言，果吹了几口，甚妥。他乾娘也端饭在门外伺候，向里忙跑进来笑道：“他不老成，仔细打了碗，等我吹罢。”一面说，一面就接。晴雯忙喊道：“快出去！你等他砸了碗，也轮不到你吹。你什么空儿跑到里槅儿来了？”一面又骂小丫头们：“瞎了眼的！他不知道，你们也该说给他。”小丫头们都说：“我们撵他不出去，说他又不信，如今带累我们受气。这是何苦呢！－－你可信了？我们到的地方儿，有你到的一半儿，那一半儿是你到不去的呢！何况又跑到我们到不去的地方儿？还不算，又去伸手动嘴的了。”一面说，一面推他出去。阶下几个等空盒家伙的婆子见他出来，都笑道：“嫂子也没有拿镜子照一照，就进去了？”羞的那婆子又恨又气，只得忍耐下去了。
paragraphs.english: Once, a little maid brought in a box and stood there, and when Qiongwen and Shishuo opened the box, there were still the four small dishes inside. Qiongwen said with a laugh, "So long, and you still don't serve two light dishes! When will you ever stop giving him porridge and pickles?" She laid out the dishes, and when she was looking into the box, she found a bowl of fire-ham and fresh bamboo shoots soup. She hurriedly placed it in front of the Jade. The Jade took a sip and said, "This soup is good." Everyone laughed and said, "You're a true goddess! You haven't eaten meat for so long and you're already so hungry!" As they spoke, they all lifted up their bowls and blew on them gently. Seeing Fanguan beside them, they passed the bowl to her and said, "Learn to serve, and don't just fool around sleeping. When you blow, be careful not to blow saliva into the soup." Fanguan did as they said, and she did it correctly. The mother of Fanguan, who had been waiting with her food outside the door, hurriedly came in and said with a smile, "She doesn't know what she's doing, be careful she spills the bowl, I'll blow the soup for you." As she said this, she took the bowl. Qiongwen hurriedly shouted, "Get out! If you spill the bowl, you won't be blowing soup anymore. What are you doing coming in here?" She then scolded the little maids, "Blind! Fanguan doesn't know what she's doing, but you're all saying it. She can't even get halfway to where you are, and you can get to places that she can't even dream of." As she spoke, she pushed Fanguan out. The maids waiting under the stairs to collect the empty boxes all laughed as they saw Fanguan come out, "You haven't even looked in the mirror, yet you're coming in here?" The maids were so angry and upset that they could only hold their breath and leave.
paragraphs.chinese: 有一会子，小丫鬟捧着盒子进来站着，晴雯和麝月掀开盒子看时，还是那四样小菜。晴雯笑道：“这么久了，还不给吃两样清淡点的菜，总吃这稀饭咸菜什么时候是个头？”一面摆好，一面看盒子里，却有一碗火腿鲜笋汤，忙端了放在宝玉跟前。宝玉就着桌上喝了口汤，说道：“这汤挺好吃。”众人都笑道：“真是菩萨！这么多日子没吃过肉，就馋成这样了！”一面说，一面端起碗来，轻轻吹了吹。因见芳官在旁边，便递给芳官，说道：“你也学着伺候，别只顾傻玩傻睡了。吹的时候，嘴儿轻点，别吹上唾沫星子。”芳官照着做了，很妥当。芳官的干妈也端着饭在门外等着，忙跑进来笑道：“他不懂事，当心打翻了碗，我给你吹吧。”一边说，一边就接过来。晴雯忙喊道：“出去！看你打翻了碗，连你也别想吹。你跑到里间来了干什么？”一面骂那些小丫鬟们：“瞎了眼的！芳官不懂事，你们也跟着说他，你们到的地方，他到不了一半，他到不到的地方，你们倒能到。”一面说，一面推芳官出去。阶下几个等着收空盒子的婆子见芳官出来，都笑道：“你也没照照镜子，就进来了？”羞得那婆子又恨又气，只得忍着气出去了。

paragraphs.original: 芳官吹了几口，宝玉笑道：“你尝尝，好了没有？”芳官当是玩话，只是笑著，看袭人等。袭人道：“你就尝一口，何妨？”晴雯笑道：“你瞧我尝。”说著，便喝一口。芳官见如此，他便尝了一口，说：“好了。”递给宝玉。喝了半碗，吃了几片笋，又吃了半碗粥，就算了。众人便收出去。小丫头捧沐盆，漱盥毕，袭人等去吃饭。宝玉使个眼色给芳官。芳官本来伶俐，又学了几年戏，何事不知？便装肚子疼，不吃饭了。袭人道：“既不吃，在屋里做伴儿。把粥留下，你饿了再吃。”说著，去了。
paragraphs.english: Fangguan blew on the soup a few times, and said to Baoyu, "Have you tasted it? Is it all right?" Fangguan thought that Baoyu was joking, so she didn't reply, but only smiled at Xiren and the others. Xiren said, "Just have a taste, it's fine." Qingshuang said, "Have a taste." As she spoke, she took a sip herself. Seeing this, Fangguan took a taste and said, "It's all right." She passed the bowl to Baoyu. After drinking half a bowl of porridge and eating a few slices of bamboo shoots, Baoyu drank the rest of the porridge before stopping. Everyone then left. A little servant girl brought a basin, and after Baoyu had rinsed his mouth, Xiren and the others went to eat. Baoyu gave Fangguan a sly look. Fangguan was clever and had learned a bit of opera, so she knew a few things. She pretended to have a stomachache and decided not to eat. Xiren said, "Since you're not eating, stay inside with me. Leave the porridge, you can eat it when you're hungry." After saying that, the others left.
paragraphs.chinese: 芳官吹了几口，宝玉笑道：“你尝尝，好了没有？”芳官以为这是玩笑，并不搭理，只朝袭人等人笑。袭人道：“你就尝一口吧，无妨的。”晴雯笑道：“你尝尝。”说著，自己喝了口。芳官见此情景，便也尝了一口，说：“好了。”递给了宝玉。宝玉喝了半碗粥，吃了几片笋，又喝了一半粥，这才停止。众人便退下，小丫头端来了洗漱盆，宝玉漱口完毕，袭人等人去吃饭。宝玉给芳官使了个眼色，芳官聪明伶俐，又学过几年戏，知道不少事，便装肚子疼，不吃饭了。袭人说：“既然不吃，就留在屋里陪你。把粥留下，你饿了再吃。”说完，众人离开了。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉将方才见藕官如何谎言护庇，如何藕官叫我问你，细细的告诉一遍。又问：“他祭的到底是谁？”芳官听了，眼圈儿一红，又叹一口气，道：“这事说来，藕官儿也是胡闹。”宝玉忙问如何。芳官道：“他祭的就是死了的药官儿。”宝玉道：“他们两个也算朋友，也是应当的。”芳官道：“那里又是什么朋友呢？那都是傻想头。他是小生，药官是小旦，往常时，他们扮作两口儿，每日唱戏的时候，都装著那么亲热，一来二去，两个人就装糊涂了，倒像真的一样儿。后来两个竟是你疼我，我爱你。药官儿一死，他就哭的死去活来的，到如今不忘，所以每节烧纸。后来补了蕊官，我们见他也是那样，就问他：‘为什么得了新的就把旧的忘了？’他说：‘不是忘了。比如人家男人死了女人，也有再娶的，只是不把死的丢过不提就是有情分了。’你说他是傻不是呢？”
paragraphs.english: 宝玉又说：“他们都是戏子，戏中之情便是真的。藕官这样祭，也是因为有真情在其中。你的这些感慨，也是因为你们情同姐妹，有很深的感情。芳官你不要过于忧愁，也不要过于悲伤，你要明白，情感并不只存在于生死之间，有时候，戏中的情感比现实中的情感更真挚。你和藕官之间的情谊，正是戏中情感的真实体现。记得，戏外的生活仍然充满希望，不要让戏中的情感影响到你的现实生活。”芳官听后，心中稍微宽慰了一些，但仍然流露出对藕官深深的关心和担忧。宝玉的这些话，不仅让芳官感到宽慰，也让读者对宝玉的见解和对人性的理解有了更深的了解。通过宝玉与芳官的对话，我们可以看到，在宝玉的世界里，戏中戏外的情感交融，真实与虚幻的界限并不那么清晰，情感的价值和意义在不同的场合下被赋予了不同的解读。这种对人性的理解和对情感的深刻洞察，无疑为整部作品增添了丰富的人文色彩和哲理性思考。
paragraphs.chinese:
宝玉把刚才见藕官撒谎庇护的情形，及藕官叫我问你的话都详细说了。然后又问：“藕官祭的到底是谁？”芳官听了，眼圈一红，又叹了口气，说：“这件事说起来，藕官也太胡闹。”宝玉忙问为什么。芳官说：“他祭的正是死了的药官。”宝玉说：“他们俩也算是朋友，是应当的。”芳官说：“那里又有什么朋友呢？那都是傻想头。他是小生，药官是小旦，平时他们扮作一对，每日唱戏，都装得那么亲热，一来二去，两个人就装糊涂了，倒像真的一样。后来两个竟是你疼我，我爱你。药官儿一死，他就哭得死去活来，到如今不忘，所以每节烧纸。后来补了蕊官，我们见他也是那样，就问他：‘为什么得了新的就把旧的忘了？’他说：‘不是忘了。比如人家男人死了女人，也有再娶的，只是不把死的丢过不提就是有情分了。’你说他是傻不是呢？”

答案：

宝玉把刚才见藕官撒谎庇护的状况以及藕官叫我问你的话，都详细告诉了芳官。接着，他又追问：“藕官祭的到底是谁？”芳官听了这话，眼眶红了，又叹了一口气，说：“这件事说起来，藕官也确实太胡闹了。”宝玉急忙问这是为什么。芳官解释说：“他祭的正是死去的药官。”宝玉说：“他们俩也算是朋友，这是应当的。”芳官说：“哪里又有什么朋友呢？那都是傻想头。他是小生，药官是小旦，平时他们扮成一对，每天唱戏时，都装得十分亲热，一来二去，两个人就装傻了，仿佛是真的。后来两个竟是你疼我，我爱你。药官儿一死，他就哭得死去活来，到现在还忘不了，所以每到节气就烧纸。后来又补上了蕊官，我们见他也是这样，就问他：‘为什么得到了新的就把旧的忘了？’他说：‘不是忘了。比如人家男人死了女人，也有再娶的，只是不把死的丢过不提，这就是有情分。’你说他是不是傻呢？”

paragraphs.original: 宝玉听了这呆话，独合了他的呆性，不觉又喜又悲，又称奇道绝，拉著芳官嘱咐道：“既如此说，我有一句话嘱咐你，须得你告诉他。以后断不可烧纸，逢时按节，只备一炉香，一心虔诚，就能感应了。我那案上也只设著一个炉，我有心事，不论日期，时常焚香，随便新水新茶，就供一盏，或有鲜花鲜果，甚至荤腥素菜都可：只在敬心，不在虚名。以后快叫他不可再烧纸了！”芳官听了，便答应著。一时，吃过粥，有人回说：“老太太回来了。”

这个翻译有点问题，尤其是这一句：“以后快叫他不可再烧纸了！”原文翻译应该是：“以后快叫他不可再烧纸了！”翻译应该是：“以后快告诉他，不要再烧纸了！” 以下是修改后的版本：

想要知道其中的真相，且看下回的解释。

这句白话文的意思是：要了解全部的真相，那请等待下一次的解说。

翻译成现代汉语，这句话可以理解为：想要彻底明白这件事的来龙去脉，那就请继续关注接下来的解释吧。这是一种常见于小说、故事中的表述方式，用于预告接下来将要展开的情节或解答读者心中的疑惑。
